description: This file defines API routes for user management using FastAPI, handling user creation, retrieval, and update operations with database interaction.

methods.name: create_user(user: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Creates a new user, ensuring email uniqueness, and returns the created user data.

methods.name: read_users_me(current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user))
methods.description: Retrieves information about the current authenticated user.

methods.name: update_user( user_update: UserUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
methods.description: Updates the logged-in user's information, including name, email, and password.

ctags.name: UserSchema
ctags.pattern: /^from src.schemas import UserCreate, User as UserSchema, UserUpdate$/

ctags.name: create_user
ctags.pattern: /^async def create_user(user: UserCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):$/

ctags.name: update_user
ctags.signature: ( user_update: UserUpdate, current_user: User = Depends(get_current_active_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db) )
